original_title: Những âm thanh ta thấy: Bản giao hưởng thành phố Hà Nội
overview: Facilitated by Echo Park Film Center, Hanoi Doclab and the Goethe Institute, The Sound We See: A Hanoi City Symphony invited a group of young Vietnamese filmmakers to explore their city on film, shooting with Super 8 cameras and processing/editing the images by hand.
title: The Sound We See: A Hanoi City Symphony
